name: typedoc-gitlab-wiki-theme
description: An extension of the default theme from typedoc-plugin-markdown to create a compatible file structure for GitLab Wiki pages.

scripts.demo: rm -rf ./demo && yarn run build && typedoc --entryPoints ../typedoc-plugin-markdown/test/stubs/src/index.ts --tsconfig ../typedoc-plugin-markdown/test/stubs/tsconfig.json --theme gitlab-wiki --out ./demo
